players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie's death is a huge blow. We need to be careful and figure out who the mafia is. Let's hear from everyone."
Diana: "It's tragic about Charlie. We should all share our thoughts and any observations from last night."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "Alice is lying! I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. Alice is trying to frame me to protect her partner."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of the unknown players? Bob, same question for investigating me. One of you is lying."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and he is mafia. Bob's claim to have investigated Diana is impossible - there's only one detective in this game."
